name: Attack Guidance Armor
desc:
When a monster declares an attack: Activate 1 of these effects.
● Destroy the attacking monster.
● Target 1 monster on the field, except the attacking monster; change the attack target to it and perform damage calculation.
You can only activate 1 "Attack Guidance Armor" per turn.

name: Life Shaver
desc: You can only control 1 "Life Shaver". Once per turn, during your opponent's End Phase: Place 1 counter on this card. During the Main or Battle Phase, if this card has a counter: You can send this card to the GY, then your opponent discards as many cards as possible from their hand, up to the number of counters that were on this card.

name: Magical Trick Mirror
desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target 1 Spell in your opponent's GY; Set it to your field. You can banish this card from your GY and send 1 "Monster Reborn" from your hand or Set on your field to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Obelisk the Tormentor" from your GY in Defense Position, and if you activated this effect during your opponent's turn, for the rest of this turn while you control the Special Summoned monster, all monsters your opponent controls must attack that monster, if able.
